languages.text: "Когда я наконец оказалась на Футфоле, это ощущалось так, словно я стерлась из времени. Меня никто не ждал на этой стороне Зева — люди, которые должны были меня встретить, которые знали о моем прилете, умерли. Реликварий, который должен был стать моей заботой, взял под крыло преподобный Иеронимус и его братья. Они прекрасно справлялись с задачей, мне нечего было им предложить".

traits.locale_text: "Когда я наконец оказалась на Футфоле, это ощущалось так, словно я стерлась из времени. Меня никто не ждал на этой стороне Зева — люди, которые должны были меня встретить, которые знали о моем прилете, умерли. Реликварий, который должен был стать моей заботой, взял под крыло преподобный Зандор и его братья. Они прекрасно справлялись с задачей, мне нечего было им предложить".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "When at last I arrived on Footfall, it felt like I had been erased from time. No one was waiting for me on this side of the Maw — the people who were supposed to greet me, who knew about my imminent arrival, had died. The reliquary that should have been mine to safeguard had instead been taken under the protection of Reverend Hieronymus and his brethren. They were more than up to the task — they had no need of my help."
languages.original_text: "Когда я наконец оказалась на Футфоле, это ощущалось так, словно я стерлась из времени. Меня никто не ждал на этой стороне Зева — люди, которые должны были меня встретить, которые знали о моем прилете, умерли. Реликварий, который должен был стать моей заботой, взял под крыло преподобный Иеронимус и его братья. Они прекрасно справлялись с задачей, мне нечего было им предложить".

traits.locale_text: "When at last I arrived on Footfall, it felt like I had been erased from time. No one was waiting for me on this side of the Maw — the people who were supposed to greet me, who knew about my upcoming arrival, had died. The reliquary I was supposed to take care of had been preserved by Hieronimus and his brothers. Their diligence had been faultless, and there was nothing I could offer them."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "When at last I arrived on Footfall, it felt like I had been erased from time. traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “当我终于抵达落脚港的时候，我感觉我的存在仿佛从时间中被抹除了。没有任何人在巨口的另一边等待我。那些本该迎接我的人，那些知道我会来这里的人，都已经死了。本该由我负责守护的圣骨匣，也早就被希罗尼穆斯牧师和他的同伴们保护起来了。他们完全可以胜任这项任务，根本不需要我的帮助。”
languages.original_text: "When at last I arrived on Footfall, it felt like I had been erased from time. No one was waiting for me on this side of the Maw — the people who were supposed to greet me, who knew about my imminent arrival, had died. The reliquary that should have been mine to safeguard had instead been taken under the protection of Reverend Hieronymus and his brethren. They were more than up to the task — they had no need of my help."

traits.locale_text: “当我终于抵达落脚港的时候，我感觉我的存在仿佛从时间中被抹除了。没有任何人在巨口的另一边等待我。那些本该迎接我的人，那些知道我会来这里的人，都已经死了。本该由我负责守护的圣骨匣，也早就被希罗尼穆斯牧师和他的同伴们保护起来了。他们完全可以胜任这项任务，根本不需要我的帮助。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Cuando por fin llegué a Paso, es como si hubiera sido borrada de la historia. Nadie me esperaba a este lado de las Fauces. La gente que se suponía que saldría a mi encuentro y que conocía mi llegada inminente había muerto. El relicario que se me iba a encomendar estaba en manos del reverendo Hieronymus y sus hermanos. Eran plenamente capaces de ocuparse de la tarea; no me necesitaban para nada».
languages.original_text: "When at last I arrived on Footfall, it felt like I had been erased from time. No one was waiting for me on this side of the Maw — the people who were supposed to greet me, who knew about my imminent arrival, had died. The reliquary that should have been mine to safeguard had instead been taken under the protection of Reverend Hieronymus and his brethren. They were more than up to the task — they had no need of my help."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando por fin llegué a Paso, es como si hubiera sido borrada de la historia. Nadie me esperaba a este lado de las Fauces. La gente que se suponía que saldría a mi encuentro y que conocía mi llegada inminente había muerto. El relicario que se me iba a encomendar estaba en manos del reverendo Hieronymus y sus hermanos. Eran plenamente capaces de ocuparse de la tarea; no me necesitaban para nada».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「ようやくにフットフォールに到着したとき、我は時間から消し去られたように感じました。マウのこちら側に、我を待つ人は一人としていなかった―我の到着が間近に迫っていることを知っていた、我を迎えるはずだった人々は亡くなっていた。我が守るべき聖遺物は、代わりにヒエロニムス司祭と彼の兄弟たちの保護下に置かれていた。彼らはその仕事を十分にこなしていた…我の助けは必要なかったのです」
languages.original_text: "When at last I arrived on Footfall, it felt like I had been erased from time. No one was waiting for me on this side of the Maw — the people who were supposed to greet me, who knew about my imminent arrival, had died. The reliquary that should have been mine to safeguard had instead been taken under the protection of Reverend Hieronymus and his brethren. They were more than up to the task — they had no need of my help."

traits.locale_text: 「ようやくにフットフォールに到着したとき、我は時間から消し去られたように感じました。マウのこちら側に、我を待つ人は一人としていなかった―我の到着が間近に迫っていることを知っていた、我を迎えるはずだった人々は亡くなっていた。我が守るべき聖遺物は、代わりにヒエロニムス司祭と彼の兄弟たちの保護下に置かれていた。彼らはその仕事を十分にこなしていた…我の助けは必要なかったのです」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Als ich schließlich auf Footfall eintraf, fühlte es sich an, als wäre ich aus der Zeit gelöscht worden. Niemand wartete auf dieser Seite des Schlunds auf mich – alle, die mich begrüßen sollten und von meiner Ankunft wussten, waren gestorben. Die Reliquie, deren Bewachung meine Aufgabe gewesen wäre, stand mittlerweile unter dem Schutz von Reverend Hieronymus und seinen Brüdern. Sie waren der Aufgabe mehr als gewachsen – sie brauchten meine Hilfe nicht."
languages.original_text: "When at last I arrived on Footfall, it felt like I had been erased from time. No one was waiting for me on this side of the Maw — the people who were supposed to greet me, who knew about my imminent arrival, had died. The reliquary that should have been mine to safeguard had instead been taken under the protection of Reverend Hieronymus and his brethren. They were more than up to the task — they had no need of my help."

traits.locale_text: "Als ich schließlich auf Footfall eintraf, fühlte es sich an, als wäre ich aus der Zeit gelöscht worden. Niemand wartete auf dieser Seite des Schlunds auf mich – alle, die mich begrüßen sollten und von meiner Ankunft wussten, waren gestorben. Die Reliquie, deren Bewachung meine Aufgabe gewesen wäre, stand mittlerweile unter dem Schutz von Reverend Hieronymus und seinen Brüdern. Sie waren der Aufgabe mehr als gewachsen – sie brauchten meine Hilfe nicht."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Quand je suis enfin arrivée à Castel, c'était comme si j'avais été effacée du temps. Personne ne m'attendait de ce côté de la Gueule, car ceux qui avaient connaissance de ma venue et devaient m'accueillir étaient décédés depuis longtemps. Le reliquaire que j'étais censée garder avait été confié au révérend Hiéronymus et à ses frères, qui étaient plus que capables de le protéger sans mon aide. »
languages.original_text: "When at last I arrived on Footfall, it felt like I had been erased from time. No one was waiting for me on this side of the Maw — the people who were supposed to greet me, who knew about my imminent arrival, had died. The reliquary that should have been mine to safeguard had instead been taken under the protection of Reverend Hieronymus and his brethren. They were more than up to the task — they had no need of my help."

traits.locale_text: « Quand je suis enfin arrivée à Castel, c'était comme si j'avais été effacée du temps. Personne ne m'attendait de ce côté de la Gueule, car ceux qui avaient connaissance de ma venue et devaient m'accueillir étaient décédés depuis longtemps. Le reliquaire que j'étais censée garder avait été confié au révérend Hiéronymus et à ses frères, qui étaient plus que capables de le protéger sans mon aide. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Nihayet Binliman'a vardığımızda sanki zamandan silinmiş gibiydim. Ağız'ın bu tarafında beni bekleyen kimse yoktu. Beni karşılaması gerekenler, geleceğimden haberdar olanlar... Çoktan vefat etmişti. Korumam gereken kutsal emanet odası ise Muhterem Hieronymus ve cemaatinin kanatları altına alınmıştı. Bu vazifeyi de layığıyla yerine getiriyorlardı. Bana hiç ihtiyaçları yoktu."
languages.original_text: "When at last I arrived on Footfall, it felt like I had been erased from time. No one was waiting for me on this side of the Maw — the people who were supposed to greet me, who knew about my imminent arrival, had died. The reliquary that should have been mine to safeguard had instead been taken under the protection of Reverend Hieronymus and his brethren. They were more than up to the task — they had no need of my help."

traits.locale_text: "En sonunda Binliman'a ulaşmaya başardığımda varlığım silinmişti sanki. Ağız'ın bu tarafında beni bekleyen kimse yoktu. Beni karşılaması gerekenler, varışımın an meselesi olduğunun farkında olanlar… Çoktan vefat etmişti. Korumam gereken emanet ise Muhterem Hieronymus ve tebaasının kanatları altına alınmıştı. Bu görev için uygunlardı da… Hiçbir şekilde yardımıma ihtiyaç duymadılar."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
